```{r cars}
source("slot_process_singleday.R")

slot_dates <- sort(unique(slot.data.subset$Appt.DateYear))
slot_prev <- readRDS("/data/Ambulatory/Data_Updated/slot_data.rds")
slot_prev <- slot_prev %>% filter(!(Appt.DateYear %in% slot_dates))
slot.data.subset <- bind_rows(slot_prev, slot.data.subset)
saveRDS(slot.data.subset, "/data/Ambulatory/Data_Updated/slot_data.rds")
rm(slot_prev)

```
